nodes.excerpt: Timedash combines your most vital daily information in one nifty widget: time, date, weather & a daily step counter, all available in one clear overview. Carefully designed with lots of attention to detail, Timedash is a must have widget for your Home Screen!

nodes.author: Vincent Meertens

localize.description: Timedash将您最重要的日常信息整合到一个小工具中：时间、日期、天气和每日步数，所有这些都在一个清晰的概述中提供。精心设计，注重细节，Timedash是你的主屏幕必备的小工具。
localize.tagline: 将您的重要日常信息整合到一个精美的小工具中

nodes.excerpt: Covering 249 countries, Canitravel.net helps international travelers navigate Coronavirus restrictions worldwide. Whether you're looking to repatriate, meet your loved one, or find safe travel destinations, you can plan your next trip with confidence.

localize.tagline: Covid的限制变得简单--一种新的旅行方式

nodes.excerpt: Boostcamp is a free fitness education app for beginners of all levels. We partner with world-class coaches to create workout programs (at-home, gym, cardio) that are progression-based and customizable. Join Boostcamp to learn how to train, not just exercise.

(我迫不及待地想多付点钱去度假)

今年夏天的天價酒店、機票和Airbnb將由強生公司（Johnson & Johnson）、輝瑞公司（Pfizer）和摩德納公司（Moderna）爲您帶來。

nodes.excerpt: Global.health is a collaborative effort by technologists and researchers from leading international institutions to build a trusted, detailed, and accurate resource of real-time infectious disease data.
nodes.title: Global.health - Access data about 5M+ anonymized COVID-19 cases
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Global.health是来自主要国际机构的技术专家和研究人员的合作努力，旨在建立一个值得信赖、详细、准确的实时传染病数据资源。
localize.tagline: 获取500万+匿名的COVID-19案例的数据

localize.description: Global.health是來自主要國際機構的技術專家和研究人員的合作努力，旨在建立一個值得信賴、詳細、準確的實時傳染病數據資源。
localize.tagline: 獲取500萬+匿名的COVID-19案例的數據

nodes.excerpt: Ever wondered what would happen to crypto wallet after you die ? Want to leave a message to world the day you pass away ? I would love to get your feedback on the idea, the design and the user experience :-) Most of the actions are work in progress though.

nodes.author: Maxime Troiano

localize.description: 有没有想过，你死后，加密钱包会发生什么？想在你去世的那一天给世界留下一句话吗？我很想得到你对这个想法、设计和用户体验的反馈：-) 不过大部分的操作都在进行中。
localize.tagline: 不要不辞而别

localize.tagline: 不要不辭而別

nodes.title:
If you have $1 million you're in the top 1% of ppl worldwide

12% of ppl have $100k or more

And more than half of the world's population has less than $10k to their name

The Best Time to Give Back

https://t.co/SLq0lIAPHO https://t.co/kHS9m7RN5t
nodes.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
如果你有100万美金，你就是世界上最有钱的1%的人了

12%的人拥有10万或更多

而世界上有超过一半的人口名下只有不到一万块钱。

回馈社会的最佳时机

https://t.co/SLq0lIAPHO https://t.co/kHS9m7RN5t

如果你有100萬美金，你就是世界上最有錢的1%的人了

12%的人擁有10萬或更多

而世界上有超過一半的人口名下只有不到一萬塊錢。

回饋社會的最佳時機

https://t.co/SLq0lIAPHO https://t.co/kHS9m7RN5t
